summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Calendar View Toggle and Recurring Duties features. All features working correctly after fixing a minor backend bug.

minor.issue: KeyError: 'duty_type' when creating recurring assignments for duties without this field
minor.status: FIXED - Changed to use .get() with default value

passed_tests: Backend: All 17 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Backend: GET /api/schedule-duties with date range query (Week view)
Backend: GET /api/schedule-duties with date range query (Month view)
Backend: GET /api/assignments with date range query (Week view)
Backend: GET /api/assignments with date range query (Month view)
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with daily frequency
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with weekly frequency
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with bi-weekly frequency
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with monthly frequency
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with custom day selection
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with end by date condition
Backend: POST /api/recurring-assignments with never end condition (90 days)
Frontend: Day view shows hourly time slots (0600-1800)
Frontend: Week view shows 7 columns (Mon-Sun) with date range
Frontend: Month view shows full calendar grid with duties
Frontend: View toggle buttons (Day/Week/Month) all functional
Frontend: Date navigation (Prev/Next/Today) works for all views
Frontend: Recur Duty button opens RecurDutyModal
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - Daily frequency selectable
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - Weekly frequency selectable
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - Bi-weekly frequency selectable
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - Monthly frequency selectable
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - Custom frequency shows day selection (Mon-Sun)
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - End condition: Never (up to 90 days)
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - End condition: After X occurrences
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - End condition: On specific date
Frontend: RecurDutyModal - Set Recurrence button creates recurrence pattern
Frontend: Create Recurring Duty button creates multiple assignments
Frontend: Success toast 'Recurring duty created for X personnel' appears
Frontend: Recurring assignments visible in Week view across days
context_for_next_testing_agent: Calendar view toggle and recurring duties features fully tested and working. Fixed minor backend issue with duty_type key access. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_schedule_views.py covers all recurring assignment scenarios.
